snippet: A murder suspect fired at an officer inside police headquarters in Jckson, and both the officer and the suspect were found shot to death, police said Thursday night.
abstract: Murder suspect fires at an officer inside interview room at police headquarters in Jackson, Miss; both Officer Eric Smith and unidentified suspect are found shot to death.
lead_paragraph: A murder suspect fired at an officer inside police headquarters in Jckson, and both the officer and the suspect were found shot to death, police said Thursday night.

headline.main: Mississippi: Suspect and Officer Killed in Jackson
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Suspect and Officer Killed In Jackson
